abstract: The increasing cost of keywords has led many owners to seek alternatives to pay-per-click advertising.
snippet: The increasing cost of keywords has led many owners to seek alternatives to pay-per-click advertising.
lead_paragraph: In 2010, Tom Telford’s management company, Cedar Creek Cabin Rentals, was spending $140,000 a year on pay-per-click advertising to promote the 45 cabins in his charge in and around the mountains of Helen, Ga.

headline.main: Has Google AdWords Stopped Working for Small Businesses?
